sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Creates payload objects for goods receipt action.

Inputs :

  • GR Record- References the goods receipt record.
  • IsReturn- Choice field for IsReturn.

Outputs :

GR Header - object containing these fields:

  • Posting Date
  • Document Date
  • Reference [ REF_DOC_NO ]
  • Bill of Lading [ BILL_OF_LADING ]
  • Goods Receipt/Issue Slip
  • User Name
  • Document Header Text
  • Print Version
  • Updated info. user data field
  • Ext. WMS control
  • Reference [ REF_DOC_NO_LONG ]
  • Bill of Lading [ BILL_OF_LADING_LONG ]
  • Bar code

GR Line-Objects containing these fields :

  • Material
  • Plant
  • Storage Location
  • Movement type
  • Vendor
  • Qty in unit of entry
  • Purchase order
  • Item
  • Movement indicator

GM Code- Transaction code for goods movement

Action Status - Object containing following fields:

  • Code - If the request is executed successfully, code will be set to 0 but if the request failed, code will be set to 1.
  • Message - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.

Product Documentation | ServiceNow

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description:
Creates payload objects for goods receipt action.

Inputs :

  • GR Record- References the goods receipt record.
  • IsReturn- Choice field for IsReturn.

Outputs :

GR Header - object containing these fields:

  • Posting Date
  • Document Date
  • Reference [ REF_DOC_NO ]
  • Bill of Lading [ BILL_OF_LADING ]
  • Goods Receipt/Issue Slip
  • User Name
  • Document Header Text
  • Print Version
  • Updated info. user data field
  • Ext. WMS control
  • Reference [ REF_DOC_NO_LONG ]
  • Bill of Lading [ BILL_OF_LADING_LONG ]
  • Bar code

GR Line-Objects containing these fields :

  • Material
  • Plant
  • Storage Location
  • Movement type
  • Vendor
  • Qty in unit of entry
  • Purchase order
  • Item
  • Movement indicator

GM Code- Transaction code for goods movement

Action Status - Object containing following fields:

  • Code - If the request is executed successfully, code will be set to 0 but if the request failed, code will be set to 1.
  • Message - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.

Product Documentation | ServiceNow
